verses.kjv: Arise, shine; for thy light is come, and the glory of the LORD is risen upon thee.
verses.ct: Get up and shine! Your light has arrived, and the glory of the LORD has dawned over you.

verses.kjv: For, behold, the darkness shall cover the earth, and gross darkness the people: but the LORD shall arise upon thee, and his glory shall be seen upon thee.
verses.ct: Look — deep darkness will blanket the earth, and thick darkness will cover the nations. But the LORD will rise over you, and his glory will be visible upon you.

verses.kjv: And the Gentiles shall come to thy light, and kings to the brightness of thy rising.
verses.ct: Nations will be drawn to your light, and kings will come to the radiance of your dawn.

verses.kjv: Lift up thine eyes round about, and see: all they gather themselves together, they come to thee: thy sons shall come from far, and thy daughters shall be nursed at thy side.
verses.ct: Look around in every direction and see: they are all gathering together, making their way to you. Your sons will arrive from distant lands, and your daughters will be carried at the hip.

verses.kjv: Then thou shalt see, and flow together, and thine heart shall fear, and be enlarged; because the abundance of the sea shall be converted unto thee, the forces of the Gentiles shall come unto thee.
verses.ct: When you see this, your face will glow with joy, and your heart will pound with excitement and overflow, because the wealth of the seas will be brought to you, and the riches of nations will pour in.

verses.kjv: The multitude of camels shall cover thee, the dromedaries of Midian and Ephah; all they from Sheba shall come: they shall bring gold and incense; and they shall shew forth the praises of the LORD.
verses.ct: Vast caravans of camels will fill your land — young camels from Midian and Ephah. Everyone from Sheba will come, carrying gold and incense, and they will proclaim the praises of the LORD.

verses.kjv: All the flocks of Kedar shall be gathered together unto thee, the rams of Nebaioth shall minister unto thee: they shall come up with acceptance on mine altar, and I will glorify the house of my glory.
verses.ct: All the flocks of Kedar will be gathered for you, and the rams of Nebaioth will serve your needs. They will be offered as acceptable sacrifices on my altar, and I will bring splendor to my glorious house.

verses.kjv: Who are these that fly as a cloud, and as the doves to their windows?
verses.ct: Who are these rushing in like clouds, like doves flying back to their nests?

verses.kjv: Surely the isles shall wait for me, and the ships of Tarshish first, to bring thy sons from far, their silver and their gold with them, unto the name of the LORD thy God, and to the Holy One of Israel, because he hath glorified thee.
verses.ct: The coastlands are looking to me, with the ships of Tarshish leading the way, to bring your sons from far away, along with their silver and gold, to honor the name of the LORD your God, the Holy One of Israel, because he has made you glorious.

verses.kjv: And the sons of strangers shall build up thy walls, and their kings shall minister unto thee: for in my wrath I smote thee, but in my favour have I had mercy on thee.
verses.ct: Foreigners will rebuild your walls, and their kings will serve you. Though I struck you in my anger, in my favor I have shown you mercy.

verses.kjv: Therefore thy gates shall be open continually; they shall not be shut day nor night; that men may bring unto thee the forces of the Gentiles, and that their kings may be brought.
verses.ct: Your gates will stay open at all times — they will never be closed, day or night — so that the wealth of nations can be brought to you, with their kings led in procession.

verses.kjv: For the nation and kingdom that will not serve thee shall perish; yea, those nations shall be utterly wasted.
verses.ct: Any nation or kingdom that refuses to serve you will be destroyed; those nations will be completely ruined.

verses.kjv: The glory of Lebanon shall come unto thee, the fir tree, the pine tree, and the box together, to beautify the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.
verses.ct: The finest trees of Lebanon will come to you — the cypress, the pine, and the box tree together — to beautify the site of my sanctuary. I will make the place where I stand glorious.

verses.kjv: The sons also of them that afflicted thee shall come bending unto thee; and all they that despised thee shall bow themselves down at the soles of thy feet; and they shall call thee, The city of the LORD, The Zion of the Holy One of Israel.
verses.ct: The descendants of those who oppressed you will come and bow before you. Everyone who treated you with contempt will fall at your feet. They will call you 'The City of the LORD,' 'The Zion of the Holy One of Israel.'

verses.kjv: Whereas thou hast been forsaken and hated, so that no man went through thee, I will make thee an eternal excellency, a joy of many generations.
verses.ct: Instead of being abandoned and despised, with no one passing through you, I will make you a source of eternal pride, a place of joy for every generation.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt also suck the milk of the Gentiles, and shalt suck the breast of kings: and thou shalt know that I the LORD am thy Saviour and thy Redeemer, the mighty One of Jacob.
verses.ct: You will drink the milk of nations and be nourished by the wealth of kings. Then you will know that I, the LORD, am your Savior and your Redeemer, the Mighty One of Jacob.

verses.kjv: For brass I will bring gold, and for iron I will bring silver, and for wood brass, and for stones iron: I will also make thy officers peace, and thine exactors righteousness.
verses.ct: Instead of bronze, I will bring you gold. Instead of iron, I will bring silver. Instead of wood, bronze. Instead of stones, iron. I will make peace your governor and righteousness your ruler.

verses.kjv: Violence shall no more be heard in thy land, wasting nor destruction within thy borders; but thou shalt call thy walls Salvation, and thy gates Praise.
verses.ct: No longer will violence be heard in your land, or ruin and devastation within your borders. You will name your walls salvation and your gates Praise.

verses.kjv: The sun shall be no more thy light by day; neither for brightness shall the moon give light unto thee: but the LORD shall be unto thee an everlasting light, and thy God thy glory.
verses.ct: The sun will no longer be your light during the day, and the moon will no longer shine to brighten your night. Instead, the LORD will be your everlasting light, and your God will be your glory.

verses.kjv: Thy sun shall no more go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself: for the LORD shall be thine everlasting light, and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.
verses.ct: Your sun will never set again, and your moon will never fade away, because the LORD will be your everlasting light, and your days of mourning will be over.

verses.kjv: Thy people also shall be all righteous: they shall inherit the land for ever, the branch of my planting, the work of my hands, that I may be glorified.
verses.ct: All your people will be righteous. They will possess the land forever — the seedlings I have planted, the work of my hands — so that I may be glorified.

verses.kjv: A little one shall become a thousand, and a small one a strong nation: I the LORD will hasten it in his time.
verses.ct: The smallest family will become a thousand, and the least of them a powerful nation. I, the LORD, will accomplish this swiftly when the time comes.
